maker: Attributed to the Workshop of André-Charles Boulle, and restored in the 1740s by Charles-Michel Cochois
title: Commode
description: Commode; Attributed to the Workshop of André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666), and restored in the 1740s by Charles-Michel Cochois (French, died 1764, master 1734); Paris, France; about 1710 - 1715; Oak and fir veneered with amaranth, bloodwood, and wamara; gilt-bronze mounts; "brocatelle violette du Jura" marble top; 85.7 × 131.4 × 58.4 cm (33 3/4 × 51 3/4 × 23 in.); 70.DA.80; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
